Richmond.Shockoe Hill Cemetery:
The Shockoe Hill Cemetery is a historic cemetery located on Shockoe Hill in Richmond, Virginia.


== History ==
Established in 1820, with the initial burial in 1822, Shockoe Hill Cemetery was the first City-owned municipal burial ground in Richmond. The cemetery expanded in 1833, in 1850, and in 1870, when it reached its present size of 12.7 acres.
